Palm_Beach_Gardens.WJBX: WJBX (770 kHz) is a commercial AM radio station broadcasting a talk radio and business talk format. Licensed to North Fort Myers, Florida, United States, the station serves the Fort Myers media market. The station is owned by Beasley Broadcast Group, Inc., through licensee Beasley Media Group, LLC. The station primarily carries nationally syndicated talk and business shows, including This Morning, America's First News with Gordon Deal, Dave Ramsey, Brian Kilmeade, Todd Starnes and Tom Shillue, the last three from Fox News Radio.
